00040 #ifndef EVENTGAMEWINDOW_CPP
00041 #define EVENTGAMEWINDOW_CPP
00042 
00043 #include "eventgamewindow.h"
00044 
00045 #include <cassert>
00046 
00047 #include "SDL.h"
00048 
00049 namespace phys
00050 {
00051     /// @brief used to keep private in one place that is actually private.
00052     class EventGameWindowData
00053     {
00054         public:
00055             EventGameWindowData(EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID GWEventID, int First_, int Second_):EventID(GWEventID),First(First_),Second(Second_)
00056             {}
00057 
00058             /// @brief What kind of change happened to this game window
00059             EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID EventID;
00060 
00061             /// @brief store a piece of information about the event.
00062             int First;
00063 
00064             /// @brief store another piece of information about the event.
00065             int Second;
00066     };
00067 
00068     EventGameWindow::EventGameWindow(RawEvent Raw_)
00069         { construct(Raw_); }
00070 
00071     EventGameWindow::EventGameWindow(EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID GWEventID, int First, int Second)
00072         { construct(GWEventID, First, Second); }
00073 
00074     EventBase::EventType EventGameWindow::GetType() const
00075         { return EventBase::GameWindow; }
00076 
00077     EventGameWindow::~EventGameWindow()
00078         { delete this->Data; }
00079 
00080     EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID EventGameWindow::GetEventID() const
00081     {
00082         assert(this->Data);
00083         return this->Data->EventID;
00084     }
00085 
00086     int EventGameWindow::GetFirstEventData() const
00087     {
00088         assert(this->Data);
00089         return this->Data->First;
00090     }
00091 
00092     int EventGameWindow::GetSecondEventData() const
00093     {
00094         assert(this->Data);
00095         return this->Data->Second;
00096     }

00098     String EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventIDToString(EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID GWEventID)
00099     {
00100         switch (GWEventID)
00101         {
00102             case GAME_WINDOW_NONE:
00103                 return "GAME_WINDOW_NONE";
00104             case GAME_WINDOW_SHOWN:
00105                 return "GAME_WINDOW_SHOWN";
00106             case GAME_WINDOW_HIDDEN:
00107                 return "GAME_WINDOW_HIDDEN";
00108             case GAME_WINDOW_EXPOSED:
00109                 return "GAME_WINDOW_EXPOSED";
00110             case GAME_WINDOW_MOVED:
00111                 return "GAME_WINDOW_MOVED";
00112             case GAME_WINDOW_RESIZED:
00113                 return "GAME_WINDOW_RESIZED";
00114             case GAME_WINDOW_SIZE_CHANGED:
00115                 return "GAME_WINDOW_SIZE_CHANGED";
00116             case GAME_WINDOW_MINIMIZED:
00117                 return "GAME_WINDOW_MINIMIZED";
00118             case GAME_WINDOW_MAXIMIZED:
00119                 return "GAME_WINDOW_MAXIMIZED";
00120             case GAME_WINDOW_RESTORED:
00121                 return "GAME_WINDOW_RESTORED";
00122             case GAME_WINDOW_ENTER:
00123                 return "GAME_WINDOW_ENTER";
00124             case GAME_WINDOW_LEAVE:
00125                 return "GAME_WINDOW_LEAVE";
00126             case GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_GAINED:
00127                 return "GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_GAINED";
00128             case GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_LOST:
00129                 return "GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_LOST";
00130             case GAME_WINDOW_CLOSE:
00131                 return "GAME_WINDOW_CLOSE";
00132             default:
00133                 break;//throw("Unhandled EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID reached during eventid to String conversion.");
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     bool EventGameWindow::IsEventIDValid() const
00138         { return ( GAME_WINDOW_FIRST <= this->GetEventID() && this->GetEventID() <= GAME_WINDOW_LAST ); }
00139 
00140     void EventGameWindow::construct(RawEvent Raw_)
00141     {
00142         assert((int)GAME_WINDOW_NONE==(int)SDL_WINDOWEVENT_NONE);
00143         assert((int)GAME_WINDOW_CLOSE==(int)SDL_WINDOWEVENT_CLOSE);
00144         EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID GWEventID;
00145         switch (Raw_.window.event)
00146         {
00147             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_NONE:
00148                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_NONE; break;
00149             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_SHOWN:
00150                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_SHOWN; break;
00151             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_HIDDEN:
00152                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_HIDDEN; break;
00153             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_EXPOSED:
00154                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_EXPOSED; break;
00155             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MOVED:
00156                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_MOVED; break;
00157             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_RESIZED:
00158                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_RESIZED; break;
00159             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_SIZE_CHANGED:
00160                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_SIZE_CHANGED; break;
00161             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MINIMIZED:
00162                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_MINIMIZED; break;
00163             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MAXIMIZED:
00164                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_MAXIMIZED; break;
00165             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_RESTORED:
00166                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_RESTORED; break;
00167             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_ENTER:
00168                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_ENTER; break;
00169             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_LEAVE:
00170                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_LEAVE; break;
00171             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_GAINED:
00172                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_GAINED; break;
00173             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_LOST:
00174                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_FOCUS_LOST; break;
00175             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_CLOSE:
00176                 GWEventID = GAME_WINDOW_CLOSE; break;
00177             default:
00178                 throw("Unhandled EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID reached during event creation.");
00179         }
00180         construct(GWEventID, Raw_.window.data1, Raw_.window.data2);
00181     }
00182 
00183     void EventGameWindow::construct(EventGameWindow::GameWindowEventID GWEventID, int First, int Second)
00184     {
00185         this->Data=new EventGameWindowData(GWEventID,First, Second);
00186     }
00187 }
00188 #endif
